NAME: recordIndex
LONG_DESC: Unique index (per haplotype) for each alignment record

NAME: queryTigPos
LONG_DESC: Query start position in original contig (not reverse complemented if alignment was)

NAME: queryTigEnd
LONG_DESC: Query end position in original contig (not reverse complemented if alignment was)

NAME: cutRefL
LONG_DESC: Number of reference bases cut on the left side

NAME: cutRefR
LONG_DESC: Number of reference bases cut on the right side

NAME: cutTigL
LONG_DESC: Number of contig bases cut on the left side

NAME: cutTigR
LONG_DESC: Number of contig bases cut on the right side
